place_of_publication.publication_title: Flora Cochinchinnensis: sisten plantas in regno Cochichina . .

treatment.description: Stems clustered, 15 cm or less in diam. Leaves 2--3 m. 2n = 28, 32, 34.
treatment.habitat: Moist organic soil over limestone in mesic hammocks and disturbed wooded areas
treatment.global_distribution: native from India to the Philippine Islands.
